description.en: Currently blockchain has many limitations. It has an imbalance of approvers concentration. It is slow, unsustainable and not scalable. The NeuroChain technology is a new augmented blockchain based on intelligent decision making mechanisms. It is composed of Bots and a set of rules represented by flexible and scalable protocols (Proof of Involvement and Integrity & Proof of Workflow). It runs on a network or media with an adaptive communication layer.
